attributes.action: Keep entertainment and hospitality venues with strict COVID regulations open
attributes.additional_details: Both the entertainment industry and the hospitality have spent a vast amount of money on ensuring that their venues are safe! Since the tier system has come into place, the retail industry has attracted bigger crowds and schools have had more COVID cases than both the entertainment and the hospitality industries. Fund us properly, stop denying we exist, let us stay open. WE ARE SAFE!
attributes.background: Both the entertainment and hospitality industries should be allowed to remain open in tier 3 if they have the correct regulations in place. We have been forgotten about and left till last this whole pandemic.. ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561917
